thread.title: Migrant trains arrive in Austria as crisis deepens
thread.title_full: Migrant trains arrive in Austria as crisis deepens | News24

author: news24.com
title: Migrant trains arrive in Austria as crisis deepens
text:
Vienna, Sept 1, 2015 (AFP) -Trains packed with migrants arrived in Austria's capital on Monday where 20,000 people turned out to show their support for the new arrivals, as Europe struggled to cope with the biggest movement of people since World War II.
Police looked on as hundreds of migrants -- many of them without visas -- pulled into Vienna's Westbahnhof station late in the evening before boarding trains to the Austrian city of Salzburg or on to Munich in southern Germany.
Authorities in Budapest have allowed the migrants, who had been stuck for days in makeshift refugee camps at the city's stations, to board trains for their ultimate destinations in northern Europe.
